meanings.definition: An animal that is one year old
meanings.sent1: The farmer was proud of his yearling calf.
meanings.sent2: The zoo welcomed a new yearling giraffe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous yearling goat kept escaping from the pen.
meanings.sent4: The yearling deer bounded gracefully through the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The yearling horse frolicked in the field, full of energy.

meanings.definition: A young person or thing that is one year old
meanings.sent1: The toddler proudly showed off her yearling drawing.
meanings.sent2: The company celebrated its yearling anniversary.
meanings.sent3: The yearling tree sapling stood proudly in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The yearling book author was praised for her talent.
meanings.sent5: The yearling kitten purred contentedly in its new home.
